name: Texas Memory Systems
tag_list: solid-state-disk, ssd, high-performance-storage, enterprise, enterprise-storage, fastest-storage
overview: Texas Memory Systems, Inc. (TMS) is a privately-held 34-year leader of the enterprise data storage and digital signal processing industries. Since 1978, TMS has specifically focused on high bandwidth, low latency enterprise data storage and digital signal processing systems. The primary feature of TMS products has always been very high performance, and TMS achieves this performance without resorting to overly complex circuitry, overburdened software designs or unwieldy protocols. This emphasis on design and architectural simplicity allows TMS to deliver unparalleled performance utilizing mature core technologies and readily available off-the-shelf components. The RamSan® line of TMS storage products is known as The World’s Fastest Storage®.

milestones.description: IBM announces intention to acquire Texas Memory Systems.
milestones.source_description: IBM Plans to Acquire Texas Memory Systems
